head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WOLFF, RUTH A.J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WOLFF, RUTH A.J.

block.p: WOLFF-Ruth A.J. The staff of Continuum Health Partners, Inc. acknowledges with sadness the passing of Ruth A.J. Wolff, mother-in-law of Kenneth Barritt, Corporate Vice President, Financial Operations for St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center and Beth Israel Medical Center. To Ken and the entire Barritt family, we offer our heartfelt condolences. Thomas J. Hayes Executive Vice President, Corporate Affairs and Chief Financial Officer Continuum Health Partners, Inc. Bob Naldi Senior Vice President, Finance Continuum Health Partners, Inc.

WOLFF-Ruth A.J. The staff of Continuum Health Partners, Inc. acknowledges with sadness the passing of Ruth A.J. Wolff, mother-in-law of Kenneth Barritt, Corporate Vice President, Financial Operations for St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center and Beth Israel Medical Center. To Ken and the entire Barritt family, we offer our heartfelt condolences. Thomas J. Hayes Executive Vice President, Corporate Affairs and Chief Financial Officer Continuum Health Partners, Inc. Bob Naldi Senior Vice President, Finance Continuum Health Partners, Inc.
